Speaking at the CUNY Publishing Institute

Thursday Jun 05, 2014

Today I spoke for the 2014 class at the CUNY Publishing Institute run by John Oakes of OR Books. Here’s a great article John wrote about the Institute for the Journal of Electronic Publishing: “By the Book: A New Approach to Teaching the Art of Book Publishing”.

Here are the slides from my talk:

And, while they weren’t part of the slides, we also talked about using Markdown when writing for the web and static site generators. Here are my two posts about those topics:

“The Basics of Markdown Tutorial”

“Want to Speed up Your Website? Skip the Database”
